00029 class LogEnd
00030 {
00031 public:
00032      LogEnd() {};
00033 };

00041 class LogMessage
00042 {
00043 private:
00045      std::ostringstream mMessage;
00046 
00051      LogStream* mLogStream;
00052 
00053 public:
00054      ~LogMessage();
00055 
00062      LogMessage(LogStream* logStream) : mLogStream(logStream) {}
00063 
00070      template<class T> LogMessage& operator << (T t) 
00071      { 
00072           mMessage << t; 
00073           return *this;  
00074      }
00075 
00076      const std::string getMessage() const 
00077      {
00078           return mMessage.str();
00079      }; 
00080 
00081      LogMessage& operator << (const LogEnd& end);
00082 };
00083 
00090 class LogSink
00091 {
00092 private:
00093 public:
00094      virtual ~LogSink() {};
00099      virtual void sink(const LogMessage* const message) = 0;
00100 };
00101 
00108 class StdLogSink : public Lockable, public LogSink
00109 {
00110 private:
00111      virtual const std::string getTimeStamp() const;
00112 public:
00113      virtual ~StdLogSink() {};
00118      virtual void sink(const LogMessage* const message)
00119      {
00120           Lock lock(mutex());
00121           std::cerr << getTimeStamp() << ": " << 
00122                message->getMessage() << std::endl;
00123           lock.unlock();
00124      }
00125 };
00126 
00133 class NullLogSink : public LogSink
00134 {
00135 private:
00136 public:
00137      virtual ~NullLogSink() {};
00142      virtual void sink(const LogMessage* const message) const {}
00143  };
00144 
00151 class LogStream
00152 {
00153 private:
00154      LogSink* mLogSink;
00155 
00156 public:
00157      virtual ~LogStream();
00158 
00162      LogStream() : mLogSink(new StdLogSink()) {};
00163 
00169      LogStream(LogSink* logSink) : mLogSink(logSink) {};
00170 
00176      virtual void postMessage(LogMessage* message)
00177      {
00178           mLogSink->sink(message);
00179           delete message;
00180      }
00181 
00192      virtual void setLogSink(LogSink* newSink)
00193      {
00194           LogSink* tmp = mLogSink;
00195           mLogSink = newSink;
00196 
00197           delete tmp;
00198      }
00199 
00207      template<class T> LogMessage& operator << (T t)
00208      {
00209                LogMessage* message = new LogMessage(this);
00210                *message << t;
00211                return *message;
00212      }
00213 };
